divs: Sighting Detailsmy future wife and I were sitting on the front porch of her old house in dawson,mn at approx. 8ish at night when we spotted a set of, what appeared to be retangular lights in a triangular pattern, moving from the east to the west. When it was directly above us, I noticed that I could see an outline of a triangular object that literally blocked all stars in between the set of lights. It moved very fast and very quietly. I ran out into the street to get a better view and by the time I really was able to comprehend what I was seeing, it had gone over the house and was gone from view. I was in awe, I couldnt believe what I was seeing. I estimate that it was roughly severaly hundred feet off the ground and was massive in size. Estimated guess would put tailend of the craft at aprrox. 150' in length. I knew right away what I was looking at, I know what I saw. I've served in the U.S. Navy in San Diego and have seen many kinds of specialized aircraft and what I saw that night was something that I had never seen before or anything like since. The wife tried to say it was a tri-pod(3 meteorites fall in sync), something I had a very hard hard time accepting. It left no trails, wasn't a fireball and lights were to symmetric to be an anomaly. To this day, I am still baffled by what we saw that night.
Summary: huge black mass w/ 3 rectangular lights in a triangular pattern
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dawson
This sighting has never been favorited.
